title: An Alien Rescue
description: Emma is on vacation with her six siblings to ring in the New Year with everything auspicious and nothing to do with broken relationships, disappointments, and heartache. But what she got was an alien abduction.Raeko, a beautiful green star-being, rescues her from horrific beasts that want her to reproduce for them. His protection and honesty stirs her heart in a way that echoes the love she has always wanted. Is he Emma’s New Year’s gift? Or is he another male who’s going to bruise her heart?
author: Calla Zae
